Word_Entry.question: Asul
Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of the sea.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is blue. It is the color of the sky.

Word_Entry.question: Berde
Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of leaves.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is green. It is the color of grass.

Word_Entry.question: Pula
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of firetrucks.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is red. It is the color of an apple.

Word_Entry.question: Dilaw
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of a rubber ducky.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is yellow. It is the color of the sun.

Word_Entry.question: Kayumanggi
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of soil.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is brown. It is the color of the trunk of a tree.

Word_Entry.question: Lila
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of grapes.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is violet. It is the color of eggplants.

Word_Entry.question: Itim
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of car tires.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is black. It is the color of the night sky.

Word_Entry.question: Puti
Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of doves.
Word_Entry.hint: This color is white. It is the color of the clouds.
